comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing

Other clinical features: Virus-associated patient with hemophagocytic syndrome (VAHS) was admitted to hospital because of a fever of unknown origin. A month after the admission he had a convulsive fit and lost consciousness. Without recovering consciousness for 6 months he died.

consequence.term: deletion in the exon 10 leading to a premature stop codon in the SUSHI2 domain
point mutation in the exon 12 leading to a premature stop codon in the SP domain
